message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,750?
